alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Waldo; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 15 at 8:41AM EST until December 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT WINTER STORM EXPECTED LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY... .Low pressure across the Mid Atlantic will move north and east into southern New England tonight and on Friday...with the season`s first widespread winter storm expected to continue across the area through Saturday. ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations greater than 6 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Maine. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Periods of moderate and heavy snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow could mix or change to rain closer to the coast at times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
